abstract: Sen roll-call on Wiley amendment to La Follette labor practices bill, N Y, N J and Conn; Repr Dickstein warns against natives as well as aliens; Non-Sectarian Anti-Nazi League denounces Nazis and Communists
snippet: Representative Samuel Dickstein, chairman of the House Committee on Immigration, warned the Federal and other law-enforcement authorities yesterday to be on guard against subversive activities of na- ......

headline.main: URGES WIDENED DRIVE ON FIFTH COLUMNISTS; Dickstein Says Natives Are Suspect as Well as Aliens
